sentence.Network_en: His feet were frostbitten in the arctic snow.

list.abs: Sometimes , doctors have to remove frostbitten areas like fingers and toes ., 有时 , 医生不得不切除冻伤的区域如手指脚趾.
if blood vessels are damaged , people can suffer an infection , gangrene . sometimes , doctors have to remove frostbitten areas like fingers and toes .如果血管被损伤，人们会遭受感染、坏疽的痛苦。有时候，医生不得不切除象手指和脚指等冻伤的部位。

entry.tran: (人或身体某部位)生冻疮的，冻伤的
entry.def: If a person or a part of their body is frostbitten, they are suffering from frostbite.

means.word_mean: 1. injured by freezing or partial freezing;
